<Text: Zabdiel Judah (born October 27, 1977) is an American professional boxer.>
Triplets:<Zabdiel Judah
1:
--------------------
Text: Zab Judah:  He is a four-time former world champion in two weight classes, having held the IBF and WBO junior welterweight titles between 2000 and 2004; the IBF junior welterweight title again in 2011; and the undisputed welterweight title in 2005, which included a reign as the lineal champion from 2005 to 2006.
Triplets:<Zab Judah
